group_1.textCenter: Ha-Hanna! What do I do?!
It hurts so much!@H-help...me!!

group_1.narration: I had pushed myself too far.
Thanks to that, my Soul Gem@was filled to the brim with impurities...
On the complex's rooftop,@I was transforming into something@different from myself.

group_1.textCenter: Aren't you trying too hard?@You look really tired sometimes, you know.

group_1.narration: Hanna said that to me before we@headed out to hunt Witches.
Even though she said the same thing@back when she met my fake family...@I just can't keep secrets from her.
Hey, you actually knew everything, right?@You knew but pretended you didn't@out of kindness, didn't you?
Who knows.@I don't have any way of knowing that anymore...

group_1.textCenter: Sena, Sena!

group_1.narration: Hanna was screaming my name,@completely beside herself.
I hated that I was the reason@she was making a face like that.
If things are going to be like this,@I'd rather have her smile.
That time was the first time@I could feel like I belonged here.
Yes.@I wanted to be here, in Kamihama,@in this world.
With my parents who gave me life,@with my classmates who chatted with me,@and with my best friend, Hanna...
...I wanted to be happy with all of them.
But the thought of getting hurt terrified me,@so I took refuge in a different world.
I should have done something for my@mother and father...@Before I started thinking that they@weren't my family...@That's right...
I should have been brave and fought for it.
I should have found the courage@to be honest with my classmates too.
I should have told Hanna everything.
If only I had taken the first step myself...@If I hadn't been afraid of getting hurt,@I'm sure everything would have been fine.
I understood all of this before, and yet...
Why does hope always betray me?
My consciousness is fading.
What's going to happen to me now?@I have no idea, but...
I did know that the setting sun@was beautiful.
Ahh, to think that a world so full of sadness@and pain would look so pretty...
Just what had I been looking at?@It's so beautiful,@so why didn't I try to understand it better?
I'm an idiot...@I got rid of my dad without trying@to understand anything.
It's only right that I receive my punishment.

group_1.textCenter: ...Hanna...!

group_1.narration: But I'm truly thankful.
I'm just overflowing with gratitude,@to the point it's overwhelming.
Because Hanna is here for me.

group_1.textCenter: Sena!

group_1.narration: Behind Hanna, the sun glittered.
It was so beautiful that@my tears started spilling out.
I wanted her to know that...

group_1.textCenter: Alright... Maybe with this?
...Aha, that weird pen...
Sena, can you hear me?@Aha! You probably can't.
Well, whatever. It's just for now.
What were you trying to say back then?
Well, I sooort of got it!
And well, if you ask me...
I don't want you to forget those feelings.
Whyyy is that?@Hooow come?
Well, of course you'd want beautiful things@to stay that way, right?
That's... Aha...
Wait for me, Sena.
I'll give you what you really wanted.

group_1.narration: I'll get everything ready here.

group_1.textCenter: What was it that I really wanted?
